entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DataView does not unescape sort strings #85367
  • DataView does not escape property names #85365
  • Ready To Run not working properly with DOTNET_EnableSSE=0 #85364
  • [API Proposal]: Source generator to replace some use cases of ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #85361
  • Vectorized code in loop performance problems due to excessive stack <-> vector register moves #85359
  • Publish Docker containers using optimized composite R2R images #85358
  • error BLAZORSDK1001 in wasm tests #85354
    8.0.0
  • PNSE in System.Buffers.IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher.IndexOfAnyVectorized on iOS/tvOS arm64 #85345
    8.0.0
  • Native->Managed (.net core) step-in not working in Visual Studio #85339
    8.0.0
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Linux stress test builds are broken #85338
    8.0.0
  • Wasm SDK Multitargeting conventions for net8.0-browswer #85333
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest on x86 Windows #85331
  • [TestFailure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: "https://wrong.host.badssl.com") #85329
    8.0.0
  • Should TimeProviderTaskExtensions run continuations synchronously? #85326
    8.0.0
  • cannot build native oat in visual studio code #85325
  • mono sgen problem #85318
  • [mono][jit] Fix float to int32 casting overflow behavior #85316
    Future
  • [Perf] 28 Regressions from DateTime and BLK<SIMD> changes #85336
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions from "Add binary parsing support to integer types" #85340
  • Various timeouts on CI #85304
    8.0.0
  • Func Performance #85302
  • Inconsistent comments on `Convert.ChangeType` #85299
  • Assembly Version of System.DirectoryServices.Protocols 7.0.0 is 4.0.0.0 (and maybe a problem for finding the assembly during runtime?) #85296
    8.0.0
  • Enable dotnet/runtime runtime and functional tests for iOS platforms to run with NativeAOT #85294
    8.0.0
  • *.comhost.dll support arm64x #85291
  • [TestFailure] System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourcePublishesAllDataTypes #85290

Closed

  • JIT: loop inversion doing some questionable profile maintenance #84319
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"SSA check failures"' during 'Redundant branch opts' #85226
    8.0.0
  • Add async dispose support to ZipArchive #1560
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: make ZipArchive implement IAsyncDisposable #79586
    Future
  • [8.0.100-preview.4.23223.1] IEnumerable<T>.Current throw System.InvalidOperationException when IEnumerable<T> collection is empty #85243
  • x64 OSX installer test failed #83459
    8.0.0
  • Подробное решение проблемы Запуск программы невозможен так как на компьютере отсутствует api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll описано тут [https://it-men.su/windows-error/api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll](https://it-men.su/windows-error/api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll) #84131
  • Broken build on Arch Linux #85315
  • Fix NativeAOT ICU build integration for Apple mobile platforms #82389
    8.0.0
  • Need help replicating the official build #85330
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsStruct(TypeGet())' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #85037
    8.0.0
  • Quic exception in the guts of making an http request #83932
    Future
  • Remove Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel 6.0.0 pre-build dependency #84925
    8.0.0
  • Re-enable IJW tests on Windows 7 after we have an MSVC++ compiler with .NET Core IJW support #12108
    Future
  • Implement source generator for proposed System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.GeneratedComInterfaceAttribute #76767
    8.0.0
  • Support modifying already initialized properties and fields when deserializing JSON #78556
    8.0.0
  • Random.NextSingle returns 1.0 #85016
  • QUIC: we should figure out how to properly handle international names in Quic/Http3 #55687
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #80508
    8.0.0
  • [mono][interpreter] While debugging second call stack level has the wrong il offset #85055
    8.0.0
  • Performance question #85295
  • [wasm] interpreter timeouts when WebSocket closes unexpectedly #84101
    8.0.0
  • baseservices\exceptions\stackoverflow\stackoverflowtester fails under pgo stress on windows arm #81360
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #80767
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWriteEvent.Test_WriteEvent_ByteArray_SelfDescribing_ETW #83015
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #84555
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAot] ComWrappers don't work on Linux #76005
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel.ForAsync #59019
    8.0.0
  • PATH=~/cmake/bin:$PATH ./build.sh clr+libs -c Release failed #85236
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount API for List<T> #55217
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add CancellationToken to TextWriter.FlushAsync #64340
    8.0.0
  • CPU usage increases after upgrading to .NET 6 #83505
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix exception leaking from filter in nativeAOT #85366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix simd12_t size #85362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support encoding `TypedReference`s in signatures. #85360
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make HelixPublishWithArcade Compliant With The TargetOS Lowercasing Policy #85357
    area-Infrastructure, Future
  • Re-enable PGO for linux #85355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reduce calli address spilling #85349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CompositeFormat.MinimumArgumentCount and remove TryParse #85348
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix totalILArgs for explicithis #85347
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Fix physical promotion scenario name #85343
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix stress builds #85342
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85341
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85337
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Fix webcil lazy loading in Wasm SDK #85335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove Base64 value length limit from Utf8JsonWriter #85334
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Exploring timeouts #85313
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Use Wasm SDK in browser template #85311
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Invoke AssemblyLoad hooks from RuntimeAssemblyBuilder:.ctor ()… #85307
    NO-MERGE, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Update KnownILCompilerPack to support iOS runtime identifiers #85300
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add introspection for readelf #85298
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix/31527 invalid currentculture applying #85297
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Fixup wildcard matching for runtime packs #85286
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Guard DynamicDependency processing against `TypeSystemException`s #85285
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set BuildAsStandalone for gcstress test builds #85284
    test-enhancement
  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [hot_reload] assorted hot reload fixes for cumulative property updates #85351
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: improve profile update for loop inversion #85265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add ssa accounting to morph's div opts #85332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Directory.Build.props: don't overwrite PackageOS from source-build. #85350
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Winforms as consultant on ComponentModel #85363
    area-Meta
  • Fix a few downlevel TimeProvider issues #85346
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix Avx2 helpers #85275
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Disable `Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.BuildPublishTests.BugRegression_60479_WithRazorClassLib` #85356
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use CollectionsMarshal.SetCount in LINQ to deduplicate ToArray/ToList implementations #85288
    area-System.Linq
  • Fix test execution jobs in the coreclr-release-outerloop-nightly pipeline #85278
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • init-distro-rid.sh: fix unbound error when VERSION_ID is not defined. #85319
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][NativeAOT] System.Globalization.Native build improvements #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add more PackedSimd methods, logic ops #85303
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose various Convert intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512DQ #85281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Create side effect commas as TYP_VOID in block morph #85320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport PR#77480 to 7.0. #85309
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • SPMI: Always add authenticated pip feed for test job runs #85327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EnC Support for Generics #85269
    area-VM-coreclr
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: fix race condition in when creating native wrapper #85235
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Do not strip exported symbols from executables on Apple platforms #85293
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make Guid.HexsToChars aggressively inlined #85322
    area-System.Runtime
  • Retry compat Random.NextSingle in case rounding from double produces 1.0f #85321
    area-System.Runtime
  • [browser] Fix publishing relinked dotnet.worker.js #85314
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix the TimeProvider test #85268
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add RISC-V CI #85289
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Support some assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove presumably-useless? serializability checks #80957
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove mono_dl_open_runtime_lib() #85253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix il_offset of inserted instructions #85305
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add function pointer type support to type loader #85287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow spill-at-single-def for pure defs #85251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add authenticated PIP feed before its use in internal JIT pipelines #85292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix edge case in stack overflow handling #85272
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • refactor the g_SyncBlockCacheInstance for aligned #85241
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable gcstress and jitstress for tracing tests #85186
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 6.0 #84681
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.18
  • Emit GC info into a COMDAT section #83371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 and riscv64 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Build Mono LLVM legs on the CBL-Mariner images, but run the AOTing steps on CentOS Stream 8 with binutils #85273

  • Add Parallel.ForAsync #84804

    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85255

    area-System.Runtime
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fixed regressions for `GT_NEG` containment #85230
